website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful fan that delivers on quality and style.
pros: Solid and good looking with reversible blades to fit any room
Durable enough to be a good outdoor fan, but beautiful enough to light up the indoors
The quality is obvious on this fan
cons: Does not have a remote control

customer_reviews.title: Installed on covered back patio. 6 months later ceiling fan came crashing down
customer_reviews.text: We installed the fan although there was some inconsistency with the holes but the professional put it up anyways. This was installed on a covered back patio. 6 months into use the fan was on a low setting and randomly came crashing down. The screws were bent like were not able to handle being on. luckily no one was under the fan but was very scary as we have small children who could have been crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: No wobble after install. Lots of pieces to put ...
customer_reviews.text: No wobble after install. Lots of pieces to put together but well worth it. Put off more light than I expected after reading other reviews. I Purchased this fan for our covered breezeway outside.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 9/2019 to install in our log cabin now the fan wobbles so much and we tried switching the blades and tried the weights no luck now we cannot use the fan and now the chain doesn’t work properly to turn the fan on. One of the blades is clearly thinner than the others (my husband is a general contractor/finish carpenter) cannot get the glass to be properly tight due to the cage around it so this really adds to the wobbling and the noise it makes when it wobbles. I truly believe we got a faulty ceiling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sarten

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER 1 YEAR 6 MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: Fan worked great despite goofy remote control in wall to turn on for over a year and then one day it wouldn't turn on and was completely dead. Reached out to Westinghouse directly but no reply. Disappointed to say the least.....no fuse blown either. Update: per Westinghouse, they do not know why amazon shipped me a craftmade wall mounted remote control when amazon should have shipped me product 7787800. I just placed an order for the right hand held remote that amazon should consider not charging me. Ugh buyers be ware!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to Install
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful fan and I love it! However my husband said it was the most difficult fan to install! The instructions had not been updated to include the new modifications made to it and it took 13 different tools to get the job done. This would be a five star if it weren’t for the instillation issues. Also, the light is very bright even though I’ve read reviews that says it isn’t. Maybe the area they are installing it in is very large.
customer_reviews.author: F’s and T’s

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks expensive. Bought the reduced price one from the warehouse. All of the products I have bought from them were certainly good enough packaging for me. Included instructions, but I had an electrician do it. He put it up pretty fast. we have only had it a short time and it is winter, so no idea about long term, but I am happy so far.
customer_reviews.author: Danatravels

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan!
customer_reviews.text: Looks incredible in our living room... MANY compliments already!!!! The only downside(like many people have said) ...it is a dim light - so REALLY think it through however before you buy it. If that doesn't bother you, this this light will be well worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: KJH

customer_reviews.title: Coffed colored side looks rich in color. Bubble glass is a nice vintage touch
customer_reviews.text: My fan did not come with a remote control nor was I expecting one. The fan blades continue to mount as all do, one screw at a time. Fan blades need a redesign where one hole on each is a slot and one is a hole. This would allow the fan blade to be held in place by a pre installed screw while putting the second screw into position for each blade. Please add this feature to manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Worst Instructions I have ever seen.
customer_reviews.text: Several steps to assemble this fan were left out. It jumps from step A to step H. I had to un-wire the unit in the ceiling twice and take apart because they left out the step to install the bottom molding that slips over the down rod. Beware if you purchase this item. Also be sure to screw the fan blades on BEFORE hanging the motor on the ceiling. It is almost impossible to get the screws into the holes and tighten. That was the second time I had to take the entire assembly down from the ceiling. I have had many other fans and this was the most expensive and the worst of them all to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It is so beautiful. We dropped it down (our ceilings are about 15 ft high) and it does an amazing job. My husband installed it and said it was very easy to put together and only used the pictures shown to assemble it. I love the lighting. I personally do not like very bright rooms at night... maybe you could have brighter light with switching it to a brighter bulb? But, it works wonderful lighting our living room at night.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Good looking Fan
customer_reviews.text: The fan was easy to install. The light kit is a little awkward, use two hands and maybe an extra if available. The fan preforms well and it looks great. Good warranty 2 years + life time motor. I am including an image from the box to clear up the cfm values that were stated differently in 2 places. Be sure to use the best down rod size for your location. This helps to get the most from a fan. Overall this seems like a pretty good value...........Time will tell. (Westinghouse 78000 52" Brentford)
customer_reviews.author: Joe W.

customer_reviews.title: NO remote???
customer_reviews.text: Pleased so far, seems to work well and decent quality but NO remote comes with the item...how much would that have driven up production costs, a nickel perhaps?.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Martin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but so dim
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely a beautiful fan and light combo. We have it hanging in our bedroom which is a timber frame home with vaulted ceilings. The bottom of the fixture sits at 10' above finish floor. we expected to add some low watt bedside lamps but will now have to go in the other direction because it's such a dim light. 5 stars if it threw enough light for our bedroom. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Birddog

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality fan.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice ceiling fan. It was fairly easy to assemble & install, and it really looks nice. It takes three candleabra type bulbs, it would be nice if it took normal sized bulbs... I've had it up for a few weeks now, using it every day. My wife loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and Quiet
customer_reviews.text: This fan is attractive and very quiet but it was extremely difficult to put together. The parts are not labeled or numbered and assembly can get confusing. Overall, I am happy with this fan but wish it gave more light.
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Very dim lighting even with new brighter bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: The base of the light unit blocks the light from shining down. Very poor light output - maybe would be good for outdoor soft lighting, but not for a regular light source for an indoor room. Otherwise, it's pretty and feels like good construction.
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA A YOUNG

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: Installed fan and spark flew from motor instantly. Defective unit obviously. We will see how they deal with the replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Denver

customer_reviews.title: Love the look!
customer_reviews.text: We love these. We purchased 3 for our upstairs deck. We have now purchased 3 more for the downstairs deck and plat to purchase 2 more for the dock.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie Hawn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous for the $. But the package showed up ...
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous for the $. But the package showed up with no instructions!! The guy I hired probably took and hour extra putting it up because it has a lot of parts and no instructions. In the end, I still have several pieces that were not used and cant figure out how to get the small piece threaded on the bottom which gives it its finished look.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived earlier than requested, Beautiful! It's on the Lani, we're having cool weather, but have had compliments on its look by men & women. I purchased the Westinghouse Remote & installed it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: MargaretAnn

customer_reviews.title: Seeded glass makes terribly distracting shadows on the wall
customer_reviews.text: We didn't realize this until it was installed and the boxes were thrown away by the installer. Now we've got a $250 fan that is headed for the junk pile.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, quiet, great quality - Love It
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful, better that I expected. Easy to install, very nice looking with the brown fan blades and darker edges. The light is fantastic and very good for providing outside lighting on our deck. Definitely a great product - we love it.
customer_reviews.author: Sabe

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for and this is a quality product. Looks great, works great, easily assembled, sturdy construction. Replaced an old porch fan and this one will probably outlast the porch.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: beautiful fan but the light remember its only an accent ...
customer_reviews.text: beautiful fan but the light remember its only an accent light. with the bottom having that plate . Cant read that good with just this light but no regrets its beautiful
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this fan.
customer_reviews.text: Great fan and beautiful! Getting ready to order two more for the family room and play rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis B.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and functional fans!
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I love this fan. We bought 5 of them for our recent patio addition and everyone keeps asking where we got them! Beware though, these fans do use the "candelabra" base bulbs, which are actually included!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck_D

customer_reviews.title: Lovely fan
customer_reviews.text: I love this fan. It works great and looks great in my house. I always get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Feastmom

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and more expensive than it is
customer_reviews.text: This fan was installed on an outdoor balcony. I have had so many compliments on it. Looks great and more expensive than it is. Fairly easy to install and you have the option of two different blade colors. Great buy for the house!
customer_reviews.author: S. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Great fan!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this ceiling fan! My electrician said it was an excellent product, also looks great in our screened porch and works wonderful. Quiet, no wobble even on high speed
customer_reviews.author: Patrice Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful well made fan. It is quiet and looks great in my patio. In Georgia we have had a lot of rain this summer and it is doing great. I just wish I could have found a 12ft extension rod.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Jo Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Rustic
customer_reviews.text: I love the beautiful rustic look. It looks great in our new covered deck. Very well made.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: One beautiful fan.
customer_reviews.text: We've this fan for a year now and it is still working great and love The Rustic look to it. Light and for small bulb but look nice.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan. Husband did indicate it was the most ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan. Husband did indicate it was the most difficult he had ever installed and he's installed many,
customer_reviews.author: Frugal Granny

customer_reviews.title: Nice fan but high speed is way too low
customer_reviews.text: Nice fan but high speed is way too low. I live in Fla and need more air. I would return it but I tossed the box.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Guiler

customer_reviews.title: Country
customer_reviews.text: This is the exact look we were going for! Not as bright of a light as expected. As long as you have another light in the room, it should be just fine!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan! Love the dark wood
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan! Love the dark wood, lantern-like lighting fixture & bubble glass which makes the walls look extra fancy! It was easy to assemble. It does make a slight noise when on medium & high, however. We hard wired it for fan OR light but will need to buy a remote to separate the two so keep that in mind. Overall great purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Looks beautiful in my mom's new farmhouse family room. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: N.S

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but I don't think it shows as much light as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICIA

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Very classy, bought 2 of these for our screened porch we use all year round. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: sarchakra

customer_reviews.title: Cool.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the area cool and breezy. Quiet motor and overall appearance is really nice. Classy yet cool.
customer_reviews.author: lessisters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: best looking outdoor fan for our new cabin home (very unique that match our cabin)
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy  Van

customer_reviews.title: Fan
customer_reviews.text: The fans work great under our patio cover however, they don't move a lot of air...
customer_reviews.author: Razz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my lanai. Weathered our recent hurricane without damage. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fan High quality too!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this fan! The light it casts is soft not the bright downward lights many other fans have. It's interesting to look at with the fine details in the bubbled glass & metal.
customer_reviews.author: SpazDaz

customer_reviews.title: I really like this ceiling fan/light
customer_reviews.text: If you're wanting this for a strong light source, this is not for you. It's more for visiting not for reading. I really like this ceiling fan/light, my husband didn't have any problem putting it up. And it arrived well packaged and in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Nice outdoor fan.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ceiling fan. I purchased this for our patio. Good quality, easy to install and works great. The light provides plenty of light.
customer_reviews.author: reliable

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan. Just installed it and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Irene Haney

customer_reviews.title: More impressive than in the photos
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful. Love this and thrilled. Looks very rich in color and finish.
customer_reviews.author: yeosku

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful fan! My husband installed two on our front ...
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful fan! My husband installed two on our front porch so that we can enjoy using our rocking chairs. They are delightful! And not too difficult to install.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie N Morrow

customer_reviews.title: A bit unusual
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in our fireplace room and the electrician who installed copied the product number so he could buy one too!
customer_reviews.author: Kate C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect porch
customer_reviews.text: This makes our screened in pitch perfect! Quality item at a great price. Packaged well too.
customer_reviews.author: Angela B Corum

customer_reviews.title: Was unable to complete installation. The fan brackets could ...
customer_reviews.text: Was unable to complete installation. The fan brackets could not be fastened to the motor mount bc the provided screws did not fit the holes. Holes were drilled too large. Now I have to uninstall fan and ship it back. Won't buy another westinghouse.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Relyea

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this fan
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this fan! Bought it for my livingroom. Everybody that comes over compliments it. Gorgeous design, super easy to install, quiet, great buy! Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.author: Annie Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very handsome fan, wish it can with a remote for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Keith J Larkin

customer_reviews.title: so pretty
customer_reviews.text: beautiful. took my hubby about 30 mins to put up. looks so nice works great I would order again
customer_reviews.author: sonja lucero

customer_reviews.title: This fan is beautiful and quiet
customer_reviews.text: This fan is beautiful and quiet. It was easy to install and really makes the room I have it in. Good product
customer_reviews.author: Mtn. Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and light that this fan gives off
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and light that this fan gives off. Easy installation (even with just one person). We used this in our family and it just gives the whole room a better feel.
customer_reviews.author: Guy

customer_reviews.title: Looks like the pics
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Looks like the pics. Light doesn't shine down with the metal cap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely Love My Fan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Love My Fan, I made my order, It Arived Promptly, & When I Open The Box it was Nicer in Person. We Hung it outside under my front onto my Huge Pergola we just had built & it Looks Beautiful! We are Very Happy with with our Beautiful Fan! :)
customer_reviews.author: Caren

customer_reviews.title: Was easy to install and quiet functioning
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous fan/ light fixture! Was easy to install and quiet functioning. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Great price
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking and rustic fan. Easy to install took less than a half an hour would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jason hellwege

customer_reviews.title: Fan is not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product specifications for this fan say it has a remote control, but it does not. It it necessary to operate it using a pull chain. BE AWARE OF THIS.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Carlisle

customer_reviews.title: Nice fans for outdoors
customer_reviews.text: Love these fans and they move a lot of air while looking great. Installation was standard, no surprises there. The lights are brighter than I expected which was a pleasant surprise. I deducted one star because both have a friction or rubbing noise while spinning. I'm hoping this goes away over time.
customer_reviews.author: P. K.

customer_reviews.title: An upgrade that changes the room
customer_reviews.text: I rarely write reviews but this fan has an awesome rustic look and will make any room or area look amazing. The fan quality is high and while it may take a little time to get everything how you want, it is worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: James C.

customer_reviews.title: Looking for modern yet has an old world feel fan?
customer_reviews.text: Well made with the style of elegant along with a rustic appeal. A compliment to my cabin like home!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: this is a nice product.  Nothing in box store as nice.
customer_reviews.text: went together easily. Balanced well. I have it under a metal patio and there is no noise or vibration. The unit has rubber mounting stuff and that helps a lot I bet. Wish they had longer chains but that is a pretty small nit. The three 40 watt bulbs give out as much light as the 6 light candelabra it replaced thanks to the glass. The spots in the glass add a bit of conversation between the lame and the patio too. All and all I am happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Busse

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks and the whole fan in general. Would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: P. Hammer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this fan it is so pretty and fits well with the rustic theme in my home
customer_reviews.author: Abridges

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I took several hours to install but its a fantastic fan
customer_reviews.author: John E McIntire

customer_reviews.title: Looks wonderful, bright light, great fan
customer_reviews.text: We got this when we enlarged our screened porch, now 11' x 14'. It lights it perfectly and looks great. It takes three forty-watt bulbs and we are using clear, not frosted, bulbs so it's pretty bright. It's not sleek and modern, thank goodness, but large and old-fashioned, kind of nautical looking. Everyone who sees it has commented how attractive it is.
customer_reviews.author: Judith K. Warner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, isn't very bright. Needed to add lamps for the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love tbis fan !!!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look and the fan works great, quiet when running.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: and it looks great!
customer_reviews.text: The fan is built exceptionally well. As long as you follow the directions carefully, you won't have any problem installing the fan. We have ours installed in our kitchen, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Schinski

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking ceiling fan!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We put the ceiling in our sunroom. Looks great, better than I thought it would. Moves air around nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Keeseman

customer_reviews.title: Lighting not bright enough. Very difficult to change the ...
customer_reviews.text: Lighting not bright enough. Very difficult to change the bulbs.
customer_reviews.author: Maregrant

customer_reviews.title: This has been a great fan. The light is more soft than bright ...
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great fan. The light is more soft than bright due to the cover. My husband installed this by himself, (the first time he's ever installed a ceiling fan) it was pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glass globe was broken and missing 2 bulbs. Fan mounted and performs well. Need the replacement parts.
customer_reviews.author: Rhop

customer_reviews.title: We could not have been more pleased with the look and overall quality of this fan
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely gorgeous! Even nicer than in the picture. We could not have been more pleased with the look and overall quality of this fan. It was easy to assemble and install as well.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped and delivered as expected, even during the holiday rush. Fans are beautiful! Very nice fit and finish. Fairly easy to install, about the same as every other fan I've ever put up. Haven't had them long yet, but they run silently and no wobbles.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Stunning fan, but dim lighting.
customer_reviews.text: It's an absolutely beautiful product. I did not rate it 5 stars b/c the 3 40 watt bulbs provided lends dim lighting, even in the relatively small 11x13 room where it is installed. I'm hoping to find 100 watt candlebra bulb replacements to enhance the lighting. Otherwise, the piece is stunning.
customer_reviews.author: Y Bullock

product_meta.title: Westinghouse Lighting 7233400 Brentford Indoor Ceiling Fan with Light, 52 Inch, Aged Walnut
product_meta.description: Style:LED LightsAdd rustic charm, cooling comfort and bright light to outdoor spaces with the Westinghouse Brentford indoor/outdoor ceiling fan with light. The clear seeded glass lantern light kit, features LED light bulbs for energy-efficient illumination. The fan's aged walnut finish brings richness to the design, augmented by the dark cherry and walnut finish weatherproof blades. Wet rated ceiling fan designed especially for patios, decks, verandahs or as a gazebo ceiling fan. Product reference number 72334.
feature_bullets: Indoor/Outdoor 52 inch LED ceiling fan with light, down rod only installation ideal for great rooms up to 400 square feet (20 feet by 20 feet)

Aged walnut ceiling fan finish with reversible dark cherry finish with a shaded edge and walnut finish ABS blades, light kit with clear seeded glass includes three candelabra base 4. 5 watt B11 LED bulbs
Westinghouse ceiling fans feature a high-quality motor, deliver powerful air movement and quiet performance with a reverse function for summer/winter operation
Fan Performance on High Speed Airflow: 4522 CFM, Energy Usage: 56 W without lights, Airflow Efficiency: 80 CFM/W
Lifetime motor and two-year on all other parts

specifications.Usage: Bronze ceiling fan, Ceiling fan with lights, Ceiling fan 52 inch with light, Ceiling fans with lights, Ceiling fans with lights 52 inch
specifications.Included Components: Ceiling Fan, Mounting Hardware, Instruction Manual
specifications.Customer Reviews: 5.0 out of 5 stars1 rating5.0 out of 5 stars
